version_description:
- Some bugfixes
- New screenshots and app icon

* In diagram view you can now swipe the diagrams to navigate the song with greater ease.
* Much requested: you can now remove songs from your song history.
* Subscribe to our newsletters after registering.

We've completely redesigned our Discover page! Not only does it look 10x more handsome, it also allows us to bring you more of our curated content. Enjoy this update while we work hard on bringing you more of the advanced/premium features from the Chordify website.

1.2.1
Minor bugfixes

1.2
We've completely redesigned our Discover page! Not only does it look 10x more handsome, it also allows us to bring you more of our curated content. Enjoy this update while we work hard on bringing you more of the advanced/premium features from the Chordify website.

Subscribe to Chordify Premium and get access to the following new features:
- Import and Chordify your own music files
- Easily transpose the chords if you want to play in a different key
- Try the capo feature and play your chordified songs the easy way
- Slow down songs to keep up
- Loop tricky parts to jam like a pro
- Download the chords from your favorite songs as MIDI file for easy audio editing
- Take the calculated chords with you as a PDF printout, wherever you go.

2.0.1:
- Fixes a startup crash

2.0:
Subscribe to Chordify Premium and get access to the following new features:
- Import and Chordify your own music files
- Easily transpose the chords if you want to play in a different key
- Try the capo feature and play your chordified songs the easy way
- Slow down songs to keep up
- Loop tricky parts to jam like a pro
- Download the chords from your favorite songs as MIDI file for easy audio editing
- Take the calculated chords with you as a PDF printout, wherever you go.
Chordify is now fully compatible with iOS 11.

- Offline Mode! Say no to distractions, excess data fees or sloppy internet connections. Say hi to freedom and being in the zone.
- A Metronome to stay in the groove
Chordify 2.1.1 is a small bugfix release.

* All new overview of the Chordify Premium features.
* Interface improvements for iPhone X.

Notifications are here! Chordify can now send you friendly reminders or help you keep motivated right from your lock screen. This is, of course, optional. We value your time and screen space as much as you do.

Dear musicians, Chordify wants to be as compatible and secure as possible. This update makes Chordify compatible with iOS 13. This way everyone can jam along with their favorite songs.

This update also introduces additional controls and information about how we collect and process your data.


Furthermore, we fixed a particularly nasty crash related to importing your own music. So let's get jamming!
This update includes small bug fixes so you can focus on jamming along with your favorite songs.

This release fixes a rare bug that sometimes appeared when trying to become Premium.
If you’re using an iPad with iOS 9, we have fixed the issue where you couldn’t search, our apologies!
We have also added the option to reset the password if you ever forget it.
Fix problem where "manage subscriptions" was not sending you to the correct place
Fix problem where "manage subscriptions" was not sending you to the correct place
Now you can export the chords to PDF in Latin and German chord languages
We like to keep our app as up to date as possible.
We were pressing the wrong frets so the capo feature was not working as expected. Sorry for the inconvenience, that's now fixed!
We were pressing the wrong frets so the capo feature was not working as expected. Sorry for the inconvenience, that's now fixed!
Do you love Chordify, but find that sometimes songs have inaccurate chords? You can now let us know from the app directly!
Happy new year! We start this 2021 with a small bug fix and some UX improvements.
Happy new year! We start this 2021 with a small bug fix and some UX improvements.
Is your guitar out of tune? We can help you with that.
Is your guitar out of tune? We can help you with that.
Small improvements
Small bug fixes and other improvements
We fixed some minor issues so you can focus on your jam sessions
We love to keep our app as up to date as possible.
We love to keep our app as up to date as possible.
